name: Millhaven Village
description: A peaceful farming village nestled in rolling hills, where windmills turn lazily in the breeze and fields of grain stretch to the horizon.

center.name: Village Center
center.description: The small village square centers around an ancient well. Farmers and their families go about their daily business with unhurried contentment.

buildings.name: The Burrowlock
buildings.description: Each family in Millhaven maintains shared storage burrows beneath their villages. Cozy underground chambers lined with cedar, each secured with unique brass locks.

buildings.name: Haversham's General Store
buildings.description: Pip Haversham's tidy family shop, offering honest prices on essential supplies for village life and adventuring.

east.name: Eastern Farms
east.description: The eastern edge of the village gives way to rolling farmland. A well-traveled road leads toward the distant hills.

buildings.name: The Grain & Grape Inn
buildings.description: A humble but comfortable inn run by the cheerful halfling Marigold Sweetwater. All musicians are welcome here, and the hearty farm meals smell like home.
